overview: Chidiya Ghar is a comedy short film directed by Amit Bhadana. Chidiya Ghar web series starring Amit Bhadana, Rajpal Yadav, Paritosh Sandh, Poonam Mathur, Vikas Bainsla, and Jasmine Kaur in the lead roles. Chidiya Ghar web series available for streaming from April 27, 2022 only on Amit Bhadana Official YouTube Channel.
title: Chidiya Ghar
